title: Inside Cynthia Erivo’s ‘Wicked’ Experience, Letting Go Of “Fierce” Elphaba And The New ‘Dracula’ Production That “Terrified” Her

title: No Kings
description: England doesn’t know how to say: ‘No Kings.’ Instead, it says: ‘Not this one, but perhaps his brother or his son.’ All Windsor crises, from...

title: The Best Books of 2025
description: Even in a fractured media landscape, these books held our attention. The best books of 2025 include Thomas Pynchon’s first novel in 12 years, a geopolitical thriller by Susan Choi, and Keith McNally’s memoir.

title: Francis Bacon
description:

title: The Best TV Shows of 2025
description: From ‘The Rehearsal’ and ‘King of the Hill’ to ‘Pluribus’ and ‘Andor,’ the year’s best shows told stories that felt like they were reaching through our screens, pointing at the world and urging us to open our eyes to the fraught moment.

title: Aging: 3-5 cups of coffee a day may add extra 5 years to life span
description: Scientists have found the sweet spot of drinking coffee daily that could lengthen the life span of people with major mental illness and help slow down biological aging by five years.

title: Overspeeding at Grantham South Junction
description: Overspeeding incident at Grantham South Junction, Lincolnshire, 26 September 2025.

title: UPSC Current Affairs Pointers of the past week | November 24 to November 30, 2025
description: UPSC Current Affairs 2025: Are you preparing for UPSC Prelims 2026? Don’t miss these important current affairs — Op Crystal Fortress, Tex-RAMPS Scheme, Cyclone Ditwah, Women’s Kabaddi World Cup, and more. Check your retention by solving the MCQs at the end of…
